transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan madam. Hello?
Executive: Haanji, aawaz nahi aa rahi thi aapka. Haan abhi aa rahi hai. Bataiye.
Customer: Bola na madam to kaisa kya verified account hai ya nahi hai wohi puchna tha bas.
Executive: Sir, verified account ki baat nahi hai. Woh pichle 11 saal se socho IndiaMART se services matlab hota hai na business kar rahe hain, deal kar rahe hain customer se ya aapke buyer se.
Customer: Baat to madam maine ki hai.
Executive: To unka main bata sakti hu. Baki aap jab se jab tak unse baat nahi karenge tab tak baat kaise hogi sir?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Baat to unse ki hai. Unka ply ka requirement bhi aaya hai to humne sab baat ki hai. Maine unko woh bhi bola ki 10-20 ply rehta to sir hum log without mein bhi kar sakte hain lekin bas kaisa hai ki badi quantity rahega to without GST maal nahi aayega.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Haan yeh bhi hai. To sir payment ko lekar abhi tak aapka kuch scene hua hai kya kisi buyer ke saath?
Customer: Payment ko lekar?
Executive: Payment ke leke kuch matlab scene hua hai kya aapka kuch buyer ke saath? Koi buyer hai aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi madam. Payment leke payment leke kabhi hamara kuch scene nahi hua hai madam.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Bas GST ko leke aapko thoda doubt aa raha hai na? Haan.
Customer: Kaisa hai madam woh jo whatsapp pe DP laga rakha hai us hisab se mera mere ko thoda doubt ja raha hai uski volume aur tone se bhi thoda doubt ja raha hai ki matlab official wagera koi government officer to nahi hai aisa.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai agar aapko fir bhi doubt hai to ek kaam karega koi aur number se aap unko ek verify kar lijiyega ki aapne kya itna requirement aapne IndiaMART pe dala hai. Koi aur hota hai na koi aur kuch koi aur person ban gaya jaise abhi aapne intro aapne unko diya hoga ki aapne yahan se baat kar rahe hain to aap matlab boliye unko ki sir aapne koi requirement dali hai kya to usse kya hai ki buyer ka thoda details pata chalega. Maybe ho sakta hai ki aap se kuch aur bole aur koi aur number se aap call karte hain to kuch aur bole to yeh to aapka kaam hai ki buyer ko hum pehchane kaise. Hamara to kaam hai ki woh IndiaMART se dekho itne saal se woh business kar rahe hain lekin isliye hum aapko IndiaMART aapko woh leads ka useries deta hai. Baki aapka payment hai, GST hai yeh sari cheeze aapko verify karni hai unko call pe leke.
Customer: Barobar madam. Chalega madam yeh mera personal information kisi ko share mat kijiyega. Baki jo bhi rahega main ek baar try karta hu dusre number se baat karta hu.
Executive: Sir personal information to humne share hi nahi kiya sir. Woh to IndiaMART pe buyer hai to humne woh to obvious si baat hai buyer to hum bhejenge na aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi lekin jo abhi mere aur aapke beech mein jo baat hui hai woh baat kisi ko share nahi kijiye yeh bol raha hu main.
Executive: Sir woh baat sir aap mere liye job kaam kar rahe hain main aapke liye kaam kar rahi hu to main kyun bhejungi sir?
Customer: Wohi wohi madam.
Executive: Aur main ek aur cheez aapko bol rahi thi sir aapka yeh jaise ki Meenakshi Plylam ka aapke abhi tak to aisa calls aur inquiries ka feedback sahi hai to aap sir apne buyer se review ke liye nahi mangte hain review ke liye?
Customer: Nahi madam review wagera kuch mangna nahi hai kabhi. Actually customer hi aapke IndiaMART se ek ya do hi mila hai isliye madam.
Executive: Aapka zero review chal raha hai sir aur yeh reason hai ki bilkul.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mere ko actually customer hi aapke IndiaMART se ek ya do hi mila hai isliye madam. Pure year mein ek ya do customer se zyada inquiry nahi aaya us inquiry to bahut aaya lekin client liye nahi hai product uske alawa kaisa hai ki thoda thoda hum kar rahe hain.
Executive: Accha accha theek hai aap maan lijiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Ab maan lijiye ki aapne bola hai ki bahut kam business mila hai by leads bhi kam aa rahi hai inquiries bhi kam aa rahi hai to aapko to sir jaise ki last time abhi humne kisi mam se maine baat kiya tha to unko maine sari cheez samjhai bhi thi aapko main batati hu June, July, August, September, October abhi November chal raha hai. Aap by lead woh utha rahe ho jo already purana ho chuka hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To buyer sir aapko response kaise dega aap mujhe yeh bataiye. Hum to aisa nahi hai ki hum aapko fresh by lead nahi de rahe hain ab aaj ka jo hum by lead de rahe hain woh aap kal consume kar rahe ho aur aaj jo consume kar rahe ho woh kal ka hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Nahi kal se mera baat chalu hai lekin jo bhi hai.
Executive: Jo bhi customer hai na woh customer tak baat chalu hai.
Executive: Haan. To aapko main aapko June tak ka bata rahi hu ab usse pichle ka to hamare paas utna abhi mere paas filhal ke liye bhi yahan pe chart dikh nahi raha hai. June, July, August, September, October sirf yeh paanch mahine ka main aapko review bata rahi hu jo aap woh by consume karo ki jo do din purana hai ya fir 24 ghante ho chuke hain to buyer aise mein to aapko ya to do hi cheeze bol sakta hai ki sir maine to koi requirement nahi dali hai ya fir meri requirement jo hai woh fulfill ho chuki hai. To aise mein to hum to kuch nahi kar sakte sir hum to apni taraf se efforts dal rahe hain.
Customer: Chalega madam jo bhi rahega main uske bare mein aapko call karta hu actually abhi subah subah thoda kaam bhi kaam hai uske free hoke aap se us bare mein baat karta hu madam theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai to sir mujhe bas ek cheez aur bata dijiye jaise ki aap jisse bhi baat kar rahe hain na jo bhi buyer hai aapka baat kar rahe ho aap to unse bas itna puchiye ki lead manage mein na ek rating ke liye option aata hai aap woh rating ke liye unko bhej dijiye unke whatsapp pe jayega woh aapko rating denge kyunki rating bhi aapka zero hai.
Customer: Okay madam main chalega aage.
Executive: Baki aap mujhe koi time bata dijiye taki main aapka zyada nahi do se paanch minute hi lungi sari cheeze jo jahan leak ho raha hai woh cheeze main aapko bata dungi taki aap thoda uske bare mein soche wohi karna hai.
Customer: Chalega madam chalega madam main aapko sham ke time pe sham ke time pe kitne 3 se 4 baje tak.
Executive: Aapka good name kya hai sir?
Customer: Nikhil madam Nikhil Patla.
Executive: Nikhil theek hai to main teen number pe hi aapko 4 se 5 ke beech mein call kar lu ek baar?
Customer: Yes madam chalega madam.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko call karti hu aap ek baar pick up kar lijiyega theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam thank you.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about account verification.

- Doubts about buyer's authenticity due to WhatsApp DP.

- Feels byleads are old, not generating business.

- Concerned about sharing personal information.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART's role, advised verification.

- Executive clarified personal info not shared.

- Executive explained how to use fresh buyleads.

- Executive asked to get rating from buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back to discuss further.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, verification, rating, gst, payment
